reviews.sentence: Excellent position very nice room. Location nice room VERY helpful desk service. We were very pleased with the room and the hotel position right at the top of Orchard RdIt has been spruced up since my last visit but still shows a bit of age in some places so does not quite feel 5 star to me but I am not seeking 5 star anyway. Desk service was excellent as there was some confusion over an extra bed booking via Agoda but this was resolved without fuss and very satisfactorily.

Pleasant Hotel. My husband and I were booked into this hotel for 3 nights prior to a Royal Caribbean cruise from Singapore. The room was very comfortable spacious and clean. It is located in a popular area. Would have no qualms recommending.

Comfortable Not so expensive and best area in Orchard Road. i stayed in Orchard Hotel Singapore from 21st23rd august 2015. my room number was 145 with breakfast. this hotel is easy to find closest MRT is Orchard MRT only 10 15 minutes walking. This hotel close to nightclubs naughty girl club and many more. In the night this area always crowds. Good hotel for family holiday because this hotel provide voucher to universal studio night safari and many attractions in Singapore so you do nt need to queue on site. for breakfast it offers different variety of food daily so you will not be bored if you stay here even for a week and it comes with asian food and western food. Room was nice and the most important thing is clean. For young couple with a strict budget do nt forget to bring extra money because they will ask for deposit means will give back after check out. overall this hotel is good for couple and family holiday.

Hotel is good but stay affected by other guests. Our room was clean and spacious. The location is just outside Orchard so it is convenient without being too noisy. The other hotel guests were quite noisy talking loudly along the corridors in the lift and in the restaurants.

Adequate. Location. I have stayed at this hotel several times before mainly for its location as it is located in an area that I need to be in. It is a good hotel the rooms are quite good and fairly spacious with decent furnishings and in room facilities. There was some major renovation work being carried out on the adjoining shopping arcade but it was not particularly disruptive except that you could not take the short way through there to Orchard Road. The area where the hotel lets itself down is at the Front Office specifically on the check in check out this always seems to take a while and has consistently been so over the years that I have stayed at this hotel. it is a shame it has not been sorted out as the hotel is otherwise excellent value for money.

A Nice Stayover. The bed was very Comfy and the bathroom was clean. The availability of the hospitality room before leaving for the airport was great surprise. I did not like the bathroom it was small. I prefer the shower and tub to be separate for the ease of getting in and out. A more modern bathroom will be suitable.
Clean rooms great breakfast and ideally located.

I only stayed one night but thoroughly enjoyed the experience. The hotel is truly 5 star. Very comfortable roomy room. Comfy bed good strong hot shower. Excellent selection of TV Channels all in high definition. Coffee and tea facilities free of charge. The lobby was spacious with a great lobby bar where a live band played popular music in the evening. Would have like more casual seating in the lobby.
NICE LOCATION. Great staff great view great breakfast great location Everything.

Excellent location for the orchard road shopping district. Singapore offers a bewildering choice of hotels however the Orchard is within 10 mins walk of the MRT and has an excellent choice of buffet breakfast for all nationalities. Stayed on two ocasions first room pleasant enough but delighted to be upgraded to a suite on the top floor on our return two weeks later. Staff always courteous and helpful hospitality room with shower facilities provided for late check out. Would definitely recommend.
Service was good but room was too small.

Nice Hotel in Great Location. We stayed in the Orchard Hotel following a cruise. We arrived for check in at 11 am and immediately were concerned due to the loud pneumatic drilling and machinery obvious close to the reception area. We were advised that check in was not until 2 pm but pointed out that others before us had been checked in. The receptionist advised us they had paid for an early check in. I asked how much it was and was advised none of the room grades we booked were ready anyway. STRANGE. We left our cases and walked about until 2 pm when we checked in. We stayed on the 12th floor and were pleased the building noise could not be heard. The room was nice fairly basic nothing to write home about. A bottle of complimentary water was left for each of us along with a lovely bowl of fruit. Breakfast the next morning was controlled chaos we were seated in the overflow overflow room. The plates were cold and a lot of the hot food was barely like warm. The second morning was easier we were seated in the main breakfast room but unfortunately the hot food was still cold. I would recommend the hotel bar for evening food and drinks. 5 pm to 8 pm was happy hour BOGOF. All the staff were friendly and helpful. The Hotel is in a great location Orchard Road is the area for high end shops and Malls the MRT Station is a slow 10 minute walk away and the MRT has to be seen it is an underground city. Buy a 123 day tourist pass and get half refunded when finished.

Almost 5 stars. Great location comfortable room spacious comfortable bed. I booked the premier club room stayed at arm 1642. Love the club lounge the room. One issue the shower heater has problem. Turned to the hottest it was still cold I caught a cold. Feedback twice during my stay but received no update the issue was not fixed.

On going building works. The Hotel is nicely proportioned but our room on the 15 th floor needed upgrading and I am sure it will be as there is building works ongoing. The building works were above us but did not affect us. Well located at the top of Orchard Road. The room itself had a lovely shower and bathroom bed and linen great but the carpet was very stained. No information in any of the drawers or folio except an evacuation plan hidden in a drawer which was very disconcerting. We had an early check in which was very welcome but the staff gave no information regarding meals etc we were room only we had to find out from restaurant staff ourselves. Also could not find a number for reception so had to keep going down 15flor for information. Staff were helpful and breakfast 61 SD per day was great.

Very Comfortable hotel in the Shopping District. Excellent location right at the start of the orchard road. A must recommend for all the people who are looking for a nice and comfortable place in the heart of the shopping district of Singapore. The room was well laid out and comfortable but could be more spacious. The handy phone was a great deal stealer and a great companion during the stay. With a recently renovated grand lobby joining with a shopping mall in itself was a great inclusion. Would recommend this hotel and prefer a high floor room for the view unles you need a smoking room which the hotel has at a much lower floor. Hope to be there again soon.
Check in took 2 trips to the counter and over 15 hours to complete with the wait in line. Rooms are nice breakfast was boring just plain mediocre breakfast.

Wedding Dinner. I did my wedding on 23rd March 2019. orchard hotel and had an amazing experience. Would like to specially thank Praba whose our wedding coordinator and I would strongly recommend her if you planning to hold your wedding there. My experience with her is she is very responsible and extremely responsive person who never fail to attend to your concerns anytime of the day during the whole wedding process. We were lucky as Orchard hotel was undergoing refurbishment works and our wedding was just in time when the refurbishment works just completed. Do check out their newly done up ballrooms with new lightings carpet new furnitures set up. Most of my guest have positive feedbacks on the food from their huating kitchen I enjoyed my stay at the suite which was clean and i personally like the toilet. Would be great if the suite was bigger and more modern designindividual preference. Overall great experience doing my wedding dinner at there Thank you. Kingsley.

End of Trip. Booked here for 6 nights following a trip to China. We booked the Signature Suite to have some pampering. Given it ’s cost I ’m not sure if it was value for money. The Suite was comfortable but not Palatial. The Manager told us it ’s next for refurbishing. I ’d love to have been here when it has been done. TV Channels very limited. I ’m a Sport fan and not much on offer. There is plenty of space and wardrobe very adequate. Did find the bed very firm. Furniture all in good condition. Service was ok. Replenishment of some items was slack on a couple of days. Tea and toilet paper. Both necessary commodities. I would have expected our fruit to be replenished daily. Only got it once We had access to the Lounge. I have to say that was my biggest disappointment. Choice of food limited. Predominately Asian and I think a few sandwiches would be good as an alternate to spices. Overall it was good but I would n’t say great. It ’s very convenient to access anywhere on Orchard Road.
Great location. The hotel is old but the rooms are nice and clean. The breakfast was exceptional. The pool is big and clean. Would definitely stay again in the future.
happy with the money i paid. averagely good but old and dated deco in the room.

Strategically Placed Hotel. Had the opportunity to stay at Orchard Hotel for the second time this past week. The first time during a business trip last year by myself. Now with both my wife and son. We booked a Premier Room with King Bed. The bed and the room itself provides a cozy setting to come back to after a long day walking around. The downside is that the hallway leading into the room is a bit cramped you really feel it when you ’re pushing a stroller and carrying multiple shopping bags. The hot water in the shower and bathtub also takes a long time to warm up. Breakfast was great and I have nothing to complain about. There ’s Continental Japanese Indian and Chinese options available all of which tasted great. The egg station is in the hands of a robot which takes a while to get used to. You can choose to have omelette or sunny side up with the robot. The robot cooked omelette tasted pretty good. Did not really get to try out the facilities though I saw a pool and a gym. In line with the hotel using robots there are 2 robots patrolling the lobby that you can order bottles of water and towel to get taken up to your room. After the experience of the cooking robot I was n’t quite ready to use this feature. I feel that the main plus point of this hotel is it ’s strategic location. It ’s located just as the road turns right into Orchard Road. It is also located next to a small shopping center called Claymore Connect. Though it does n’t offer much in terms of shops the small shopping small has a supermarket for you to buy items you ’ve forgotten to pack or that you ’ve run out of during the trip. Whilst the hotel itself is a comfortable place to stay I think its strategic location is its best feature.

Great hotel great location and staff that go out of their way to fix problems. We had two two day stopovers when traveling to Australia in this hotel in Sept 2019. We stayed here before but that was about 8 years ago and loved it and booked it again because of this experience. There were problems but in fairness to the staff they went out of their way to resolve it. My husband and I were traviling with our 11 month old son and booked premier club rooms in the orchard hotel to break up the trip to Australia. on the way to Australia we arrived early 9 am before check in and in fairness to the staff they advised that would have some rooms ready within a couple of hours which they did and we we are in a room by 11 am. The only problem which was a significant problem was the building works in the room next door where they were stripping the room back as part of the refurbishment programme. The banging and noise was horrendous. So we called recpetion and they immediately and without question moved and upgraded us to a signature club room which resolved the situation. The club rooms all come with access to the club lounge for breakfast afternoon tea and evening drinks and we can not praise the staff in the lounge enough for the way they looked after us particularly with our baby boy. They were attentive knowledgable and very helpful. The lounge is quiet with great views of the surrounding area as it is based on the 17th floor at the top of the building. The swiming pool area is a great area a really large pool and fairly quiet but great for us with our baby. The return journey we arrived late and booked a paid for late check out at half the room price to 6 pm. The room was a premier club room which is a great sized room and well equipted and on the 15th floor with great views. The staff again in the club lounge were brilliant. The only problem we encountered was on our last day with the late checkout. We had asked for our room to be tidied expecting bins to be emptied and bathroom cleaned but instead got locked out of our room by the hotel despite the preagred late check out. I would also note the holding deposit on my credit card which would have easlily covered this. So we had to get the room keys reactivated and then got some teas coffees and toilet rolls from house keeping which were on the floor. When finailising our bill we raised that we were disapointed with this part and they agreed to omit this charge from the bill. In fairness to the staff and management whilst there were problems they dealt with them really well and we are grateful for that and will look forward to staying at the Orchard Hotel again.

Good choice made to stay at the Orchard Hotel. The easy of checking in. Professional attitude of the staff. Near to orchard road. Overall a good choice made. The hotel staff some do not know information abt the hotel. I contacted the hotel prior to booking. Enquired abt the Club room. The lady was unfamiliar with the information. And had to be heard flipping pages to get the answer. Qn asked was what facilities are available to club room guests.

Arrived just after 80 am after a 13 hour flight room unavailable till 130 was given key to hospitality room with 5 other guest. Mini bar prices too excessive two 1Lt bottles of water 16 S dollars can of Heineken 10 S dollars. Other than nice hotel.

Good would recommend it. If you want to avoid queues for breakfast go down by 8 am. Described as a five star hotel is questionable. I would rate it as a 4 star facilities good we had a signature room on the 17th floor out of 18. Nice and quietLibrary on 18th floor. Nigly thing like minimal supply of tea bags in room I can see they do not want waste but. Lighting switches were so small and took a little working out with blind going up and down until we worked out the sequence. there is a lot of cris crossing for food at the buffet breakfast. But do not take these as reasons not to stay. Surprised to be debited 200 singapore dollars when the estimated cost was 70. Am awaiting the balance to be refunded to my account a day after leaving. Was it because I used a loaded debit card rather than a credit card. If I had have used credit card would have had costs found that out having hired a car in AustraliaMaybe a while before we return to central Singapore as a week seems a long time unles you are a shopaholic. Orchard Hotel is at the top of this shopping street. My recommendation would be to stay a bit further down to be in a more central location. Use MRT it is easy when you have worked it out.

So so. the room door can not open fully blocked by top hinge. Luckily we did not take a full size luggage with us or else the bag will not be able to move in. And the room size is smaller than the what is stated in the description as well.

Seriously must look intk. Airflow is poor result in low oxygen level cause difficult to breath sound proof system is too bad. can hear next door clearly. Toilet no bidet insufficient lights can not work on my document. Mug still got on.

Amazing 3 Night stay with Beautiful Breakfast. We decide to stay around orchard road and we booked 3 nights from 14th to 17th December 2019 at this Hotel. We booked Grand Deluxe Room with Breakfast. Upon arrival around 1 am Mr Harun welcome Us with super friendly in early morning Express check in less than 5 minutesso thanks to Him and he greet us every morning before breakfast Very good staff. Room attendant looks after our room Change our towel everyday. Make up our room nicely. Breakfast is excellent for us as Balinese. Perfect staffs to arrange the table. Plenty choices to eat and drink as your calories to give to your body before exploring the city. This hotel has great location veryShort walk to Bus station Delfi orchard road10 minutes walk to orchard MRT station Ion shopping centerDuring check out I met Mr. BrianNice looking guyin the lift and I ask him for assistant to help me to find me weight scale for my Baggage He patiently Help me without any Problem. Overall Definitely I highly recommend this Hotel and My wife. so Glad to visit Singapore for the first time. Love From Bali Island GEDE NGURAH WIJANA WhatsAp 6281379793.

Not really a happy stay actually. First room not ready when we checked in eventhough its 230pm already and have to wait another almost 15 hour later to get a key. Second aircon in the room totally not strong. Its too late at night when we discover after we back from the room thus we did nt say anything. Thirdly not according what we ordered. We ordered to have 1 big bed and they gave 2 singles. Then the bed were old not confortable at all to be honest and we checked out early as we did nt feel that comfy as what we thought before. Fourthly with amount we paid to stay there room size and your breakfast not fantastic What a good thing from your hotel was your stuff pretty friendly.
Fantastic location welcoming and friendly staff wonderful facilities. room was small but beautifully clean with everything you need. Will definitely stay here again.
